name: Zyma
description:
GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS!

Zyma is a combination of shooter, platformer and rouglike. Reach to the highest point of cyberpunk city covered in snow!

Game was made for Totally Ranked Holiday Jam in less than 4 days in free time between cleaning house and making pierogis for Christmas ;). 

There is no goal in game other to reach the high as you can. Climb on the walls of highest buildings of cyberpunk city. Destroy all drones and upgrade your weapon in shop to the point where no one can stop you!

Controls:

  • WASD/ARROWS - Movement
  • SPACE/W/UP ARROW - JUMP
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT

Tips:

  • In game you can also wall jump and double jump. 
  • When mouse is near enemy it will autolock on then.
  • Entering shop will fully heal you.

Lore:

You are a cyborg named Zyma that is trying to run away from laboratory. All the drones are reaady to neutralize you! So grab your weapon and get out of that city!
